entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
